text: Daniel Pedro Martinho Teixeira (born 7 September 1998), better known as just Pedro Teixeira, is a Swiss professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Kriens on loan from Young Boys. ==Professional career== Teixeira joined his local club Neuchâtel Xamax at the age of 10. After a successful debut season with Xamax in the Swiss Challenge League, Teixeira signed a 4-year contract with BSC Young Boys on 30 August 2017. Teixeira made his professional debut in a 2-1 2017–18 UEFA Europa League win over KF Skënderbeu Korçë on 7 December 2017. He was loaned out to FC Rapperswil-Jona on 15 January 2019 for the rest of the season.Tinte trocken – Pedro Texeira kommt von YB!, fcrj.ch, 15 January 2019 On 12 September 2019, Teixeira joined Swiss Challenge League side Kriens on a season-long loan deal. ==International career== Teixeira was born in Switzerland to Portuguese parents, and is a one-time international for the Switzerland U19s, and most recently represented the Switzerland U20s. ==References== ==External links== * * FuPa Profile * SFL Profile * SFV Profile Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Neuchâtel Category:Swiss footballers Category:Switzerland youth international footballers Category:Swiss people of Portuguese descent Category:BSC Young Boys players Category:Neuchâtel Xamax FCS players Category:FC Rapperswil-Jona players Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Swiss Challenge League players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Pedro Teixeira (footballer)
